signature: TransformedMap<K, V> transformedMap(Map<K, V>, Transformer<? super K, ? extends K>, Transformer<? super V, ? extends V>)

enhanced_by.method_name: transformingMap(Map<K, V>, Transformer<? super K, ? extends K>, Transformer<? super V, ? extends V>)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods create a transformed map with similar input parameters and transformation logic.
The transformedMap method internally uses transformMap to transform existing map contents.
The transformedMap method initializes the map and may require subsequent put operations to test the transformation logic.
The transformedMap method initializes the map and may require subsequent putAll operations to test the transformation logic.
